scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket dynamodb-lambda-publisher-sns-bucket
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name dynamodb-lambda-publisher-sns --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides TableName=$npm_package_config_table_name
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
